description:
This module provides functions that perform HMAC
 (hash-based message authentication code) operations.
 For example, they calculate message codes involving hash functions such
 as MD5 and various SHA variants. The result is the base64 encoded value
 of the hash. A hash may be used to verify the data integrity and
 the authenticity of a message.

functions.name: compute-binary
functions.signature: ($message as xs:base64Binary, $secret-key as xs:string, $hash-algo as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary external
functions.description:
Calculate the HMAC for the given message and secret-key involving
 an custom hash function. Before calculating the code, the given
 base64-encoded message is base64-decoded.
functions.summary: Calculate the HMAC for the given message and secret-key involving an custom hash function.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: the message to be authenticated

parameters.name: secret-key
parameters.description: the secret key used for calculating the authentication

returns.description: the base64 encoded message authentication code

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">hash:UNSUPPORTED-ALGORITHM if the given hash algorithm is not supported</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: compute
functions.signature: ($message as xs:string, $secret-key as xs:string, $alg as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary external
functions.description:
Calculate the HMAC for the given message and secret-key involving
 an custom hash function.
functions.summary: Calculate the HMAC for the given message and secret-key involving an custom hash function.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: the message to be authenticated

parameters.name: secret-key
parameters.description: the secret key used for calculating the authentication

parameters.name: alg
parameters.description: The algorithm to use for the hashing operation. Supported algorithms are "md5", "sha1", and "sha256".

returns.description: the base64 encoded message authentication code

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">hash:UNSUPPORTED-ALGORITHM if the given hash algorithm is not supported</xqdoc:error>
